author: senh
title: Breathtaking ruins of Soviet space program
text: BING NEWS: Breathtaking ruins of the Soviet space shuttle program (CNN)What was once the gleaming pride-and-joy of the Soviet space program, now lies covered in dirt and bird droppings in a disused hangar in Kazakhstan.
